step.cmd: Create a subdirectory (e.g., pg) and move PostgreSQL-related files there. Create a subdirectory (e.g., pg) and move PostgreSQL-related files there.
Add the PostgreSQL engine to the configuration: sqitch engine add pg --client /usr/local/pgsql/bin/psql
Set the top directory for the PostgreSQL engine: This command configures Sqitch to use the newly-created pg directory for PostgreSQL-related scripts.
To verify and view all the settings for the PostgreSQL engine, run: sqitch engine show pg
The show action displays the fully-evaluated configuration, showing the top directory and client settings.
To add SQLite support, run the command: sqitch engine add sqlite --client /path/to/sqlite3
